IEEE Draft Standard Criteria for Accident Monitoring Instrumentation for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P497/D2, Mar 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Criteria for variable selection, performance, design, and qualification of accident monitoring instrumentation are established in this standard. Included requirements for display alternatives for accident monitoring instrumentation, documentation of design bases, and use of portable instrumentation.
